Name.en: Senka Legend - One Hundred Thousand Arrows

Effect.en: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 "Senka" monster you control; until the end of this turn, halve that opponent's monster's ATK, and if you do, add that lost ATK to that monster you control (even if this card leaves the field). If this card is sent to the GY while you control 2 or more "Senka" monsters with different Attributes: You can place 1 "Senka" Continuous Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck face-up on your field, except "Senka Legend - One Hundred Thousand Arrows". You can only use each effect of "Senka Legend - One Hundred Thousand Arrows" once per turn.
